data.text: Na Temanni Elifas buaa Hiob se,
“Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔne wo kasa a, worennya ntoboase ana?
Dwene sɛnea wakyerɛkyerɛ nnipa bebree,
Wo nsɛm ahyɛ wɔn a wɔahintiw no den;
Na afei a ɔhaw aba no, wʼaba mu abu;
So ɛnsɛ sɛ wo nyamesuro yɛ wʼahotoso
“Dwene ho: Wɔasɛe obi a ne ho nni asɛm pɛn ana?
Sɛnea mahu no, wɔn a wofuntum bɔne
Onyankopɔn home ano, wɔsɛe;
Gyata betumi abobɔ mu na wɔaworo so,
Gyata annya hanam a owu,
“Wɔbɛkaa kokoamsɛm bi kyerɛɛ me
Wɔ anadwo daeso basabasa mu,
ehu ne nketenkete kyeree me
Honhom bi twaa mʼani so,
Egyinae,
‘Onipa desani betumi ateɛ asen Onyankopɔn?
Sɛ Onyankopɔn ntumi mfa ne ho nto nʼankasa asomfo so,
na nkantom wɔn a wɔtete dɔte afi mu,
Efi anɔpahema kosi anwummere wobubu wɔn mu nketenkete;
So wommiamia wɔn ntamadan ahama mu,
